client_id.description: Property.  Identifying string. Must be unique in the topic namespace.

marker_name.description: Property.  Feedback message sent back from the GUI, e.g.  when the status of an interactive marker was modified by the user.  Specifies which interactive marker and control this message refers to

event_type.description: Property.  Type of the event  KEEP_ALIVE: sent while dragging to keep up control of the marker  MENU_SELECT: a menu entry has been selected  BUTTON_CLICK: a button control has been clicked  POSE_UPDATE: the pose has been changed using one of the controls

pose.description: Property.  Current pose of the marker  Note: Has to be valid for all feedback types.

menu_entry_id.description: Property.  Contains the ID of the selected menu entry  Only valid for MENU_SELECT events.

mouse_point.description: Property.  If event_type is BUTTON_CLICK, MOUSE_DOWN, or MOUSE_UP, mouse_point  may contain the 3 dimensional position of the event on the  control. If it does, mouse_point_valid will be true. mouse_point  will be relative to the frame listed in the header.
